title: The Republic of Tea ‚Äì Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle ‚Äì 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
üçÇ Embrace the Essence of Autumn with The Republic of Tea's Exquisite Fall Apple Tea Collection üçé

Welcome the cozy season with a cup of warmth and the nostalgic flavors of autumn orchards. The Republic of Tea is proud to present its Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle, featuring the Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea varieties, with 36 delightful tea bags of each flavor.

üçè **Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**: Dive into the heartwarming blend of classic apple cider, lovingly mingled with a symphony of cinnamon and cloves. Each tea bag is a caffeine-free escape to a crisp fall day, featuring an expertly curated mix of apple pieces, cinnamon, zesty orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cardamom seeds, and a touch of citric acid. It's the perfect companion for a chilly evening or a relaxing moment by the fireplace.

üçé **Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**: Indulge in the sweet, creamy notes of this caffeine-free delight. Every sip is a guilt-free treat that marries the taste of ripe, sweet apples with the luxurious hint of vanilla, all resting on a bed of smooth South African Rooibos. The natural apple and caramel flavors blend seamlessly with vanilla extract to create a taste sensation that's as indulgent as your favorite autumn dessert.

üçÅ Steeping these teas is a simple pleasure. Bring water to a rolling boil, pour 6 oz over your tea bag, and steep for 5-7 minutes to unlock the full bouquet of flavors. As a bonus, The Republic of Tea encourages eco-conscious sipping by suggesting that used tea bags be added to compost or soil, enriching your garden with the love of tea.

Whether you're looking for the perfect accompaniment to the harvest season, a dessert tea to sweeten your evenings, or a thoughtful gift for a fellow tea lover, this Herbal Tea Bundle is an impeccable choice. Enjoy the bounty of the season with each cup, and let The Republic of Tea's Fall Apple Teas be the highlight of your autumnal rituals.

üõçÔ∏è Don't miss out on this limited edition offering. Elevate your tea experience and savor the season with The Republic of Tea ‚Äì Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle today!

üçÇüçé **Embrace the Essence of Autumn with The Republic of Tea ‚Äì Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle!** üçéüçÇ

Welcome the cozy season with open arms and a warming cup of The Republic of Tea's exclusive Fall Apple Teas. This sumptuous bundle includes 36 tea bags each of two tantalizing flavors: Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. Crafted for those crisp autumn days, these blends are the perfect companions for snuggling under a blanket or gathering around the fireplace.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**
Experience the quintessential taste of fall with this caffeine-free infusion that marries the classic flavors of fresh apple cider with a hint of spice. Each tea bag is a comforting blend of apple pieces, cinnamon, and cloves, complemented by the zesty notes of orange peel, rose hips, and ginger root, with a finishing touch of cardamom seeds. Steep a cup and enjoy the nostalgic taste of a homemade apple cider without any of the fuss.

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**
Indulge in the sweetness of autumn with this delectable, caffeine-free blend. It's like biting into a caramel-dipped apple at the harvest fair. The base of South African Rooibos is elegantly paired with natural apple and caramel flavors, and a whisper of vanilla extract for a smooth, creamy finish. This tea is a guilt-free treat that will satisfy any sweet tooth, making every sip a celebration of the season.

**Simple Steeping Instructions**
Brew the perfect cup every time with our easy-to-follow instructions. Use 6 oz of water at a rolling boil and let it steep for 5-7 minutes. After savoring your tea, remember that the tea bags can be added to your compost or soil, making this a gift to you and the Earth.

**Why Choose Our Bundle?**
- **Limited Edition**: Exclusively crafted for the fall season, these flavors are as fleeting as the autumn leaves.
- **Caffeine-Free**: Unwind any time of day with these naturally caffeine-free herbal blends.
- **36 Count Each**: Enjoy a generous supply of each delicious flavor, perfect for sharing or savoring solo.
- **Versatile**: Ideal as an accompaniment to the harvest season, as a dessert tea, or as a centerpiece for your next autumnal gathering.

Don't let this autumn pass without savoring the flavors of the season. Order your Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle from The Republic of Tea today and make every cup an orchard-fresh delight! üçÅü´ñ

üçè Caramel Apple Herbal Tea üçè
